bio.name: enrico opezzo
bio.bio:
I'm a junior front-end developer with a background in graphic and virtual design, as well as watchmaking. I've spent the last five years repairing and servicing luxury watches, and before that, I was creating websites and graphic content for clients as a freelancer.
Now, I'm excited to apply my web development skills to create engaging and functional web experiences. I'm proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I've worked with React framework to create single page applications. I've got a keen eye for detail and I love creating designs that exceed client expectations.
I'm currently studying Typescript.
